sentences.sContent: Whatever your reason for borrowing, we have the loan that suits your needs .
sentences.sCn: 不管您因何贷款，我们都会有满足您需要的贷款。

sentences.sContent: There’s a range of restaurants to suit all tastes .
sentences.sCn: 有各种各样的餐馆可以满足所有口味。

sentences.sContent: There are countryside walks to suit everyone .
sentences.sCn: 有适合每个人的乡村步行路径。

sentences.sContent: We have gifts to suit every pocket (= of all prices ) .
sentences.sCn: 我们有各种价格的礼物。

sentences.sContent: Either steak or chicken would suit me fine .
The climate there will suit you down to the ground (= suit you very well ) .
sentences.sCn: 那儿的天气你会非常满意。
